reviewText: TRUST ME ON THIS ONE GANG IF YOU DONT LIKE MARTIAL ARTS MOVIES YOU'LL LIKE THE STORY IF YOU DO LIKE AND APPRECIATE MARTIAL ARTS, YOU WILL YOU LOVE IF NOT APPRECIATE AND ADORE THIS MOVIE. I'M TOLD THEY ARE REVAMPING THE DVD INTO HD, HOPEFULLY INTO BLUE RAY.  I REMEMBER MY MOTHER TOOK ME AND MY BEST FRIEND TO SEE A TRIPLE FEATURE, IT WAS GREAT GOING TO THE MOVIES IN THOSE DAYS.  WE WAS REALLY THERE TO SEE THE BLACK DRAGON AND THE OTHER WAS BLACK SCRALET WOW WE THOUGHT IT WAS A MARTIAL PICTURE , BUT NOOO ITS A VERY EXPLICT DRAMA SHOW BIGGG MELLONS WOW! TO A 8YR OLD KIDS. THEN IT WAS THE BLOOD OF THE NINJA STARRING JIMMY WONG. NEVER HEARD OF HIM. LET ME TELL YOU , WE DISAPPOINTED WTIH THE BLACK DRAGON MOVIE, WE WAS WOWED OF THE SEX SCENES OF THE BLACK SCARLET. BUT MAN WE LOVED THIS BLOOD OF THE NINJA MOVIE, WE COULDNT STOP TALKING ABOUT.  EVEN MY MOTHER WHO TOOK US FOR MY BIRTHDAY COULDNT STOP TALKING ABOUT. GREAT ACTION GREAT FUN. ITS A MUST SEE!!!!! TRUST ME YOU LOVE IT!!!!  CATCH ME ON MY NEXT REVIEW ON FACEBOOK.  PEACE AND LOVE TO ALL!
I just want to say that this Movie looks better on the old VHS.
